Everything You Know IS Wrong (Lloyd Pye on Alien Intervention Theory) From 1999 UFO Congress.VHSrip.xvid.avi (Covers Ancient Aliens,Evolution, Bigfoot)

	

Alien Intervention
Intervention theory began in 1968 with the publication of Erich Von DanikenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Chariots of the Gods. Von Daniken focused on the wide array of megalithic structures around the world that so obviously are beyond modern capacities to match. Surely, he argued, only intervention by non-human, off-world entities could explain how such immense structures could be built to tolerances that todayÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s engineers can only marvel at. One favorite quote is that the Pyramids are Ã¢â‚¬Å“Rolex watches built on a scale of small mountains,Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ as are Baalbek in Lebanon, Tiahuanaco in Bolivia, and Sachsahuaman and Ollantaytambo in Peru, among dozens of monuments less cyclopean in size but no more likely to have been created by the minds and muscles of ordinary humans.

Lloyd Pye talks about the Intervention Theory of Origins, and his new eBook, " Intervention Theory Essentials" and also in this video :)
